mapper.select: select c.uid, c.pno, p.pimage, p.pname, p.pprice, c.amount, cno, c.amount * pprice sum, chk from shopproduct p, shopcart c where c.uid=#{uid} and c.pno = p.pno order by cno desc
mapper.insert: insert into shopcart(pno, uid, amount) values(#{pno}, #{uid}, #{amount})
mapper.update: update shopcart set amount=#{amount} where cno=#{cno};
update shopcart set chk=#{chk} where cno=#{cno};
mapper.select: select c.uid, c.pno, p.pimage, p.pname, p.pprice, c.amount, cno, c.amount * pprice sum, chk from shopproduct p, shopcart c where c.uid=#{uid} and c.pno = p.pno and chk=1
mapper.insert: insert into orderlist(uid, pno, amount, orno, zipcode, address1, address2, receiver, tel) values(#{uid}, #{pno}, #{amount}, #{orno}, #{zipcode}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{receiver}, #{tel})
mapper.delete: delete from shopcart where uid=#{uid} and chk=1;
mapper.select: select * from shopcart where uid = #{uid} and pno = #{pno}
select * from orderlist where orno = #{orno} group by orno;
mapper.update: update shopproduct set sellcount = sellcount+#{amount} where pno=#{pno};
mapper.select: select p.* from orderlist o, shopproduct p where (odate>(select DATE_ADD(now(), interval -1 day))) and o.pno=p.pno group by pno order by p.sellcount desc limit 10;
select p.* from shopproduct p order by p.sellcount desc limit 10;
select point, id uid from user where id = #{uid};
